!Subclass Skill Certification: You are trying to obtain leevl 75 certification of %className%, common skill or special skill. Remember that once this subclass is certified, it cannot be re-certified -- even if you delete this class and develop another one -- without a special and expensive cancellation process. Do you still want to be certified? [npc_%objectId%_GetCertification75C|Obtain class specific skill certification.] [npc_%objectId%_GetCertification75M|Obtain master skill certification.] [npc_%objectId%_CertificationList|Do not obtain certification.]
